doc.after: Operations research provides techniques for solving practical problems in business and other fields problems such as allocating resources to maximize profit or scheduling project activities to minimize risk Operations research techniques include linear programming and other areas of optimization queuing theory scheduling theory network theory Operations research also includes continuous topics such as continuous time Markov process continuous time martingales process optimization and continuous and hybrid control theory
